fields.title: Now You See Me
fields.review: I really enjoyed this movie and it one of my favourites. One point that i really like is that you always have to expect the unexpected because around every twist there is another turn.

fields.title: War Dogs
fields.review: The beginning of the film made me think am I going to like this or not? However once the story was set it became a really enjoyable watch.

fields.title: Knight And Day
fields.review: A comedic spy movie that held my attention. It was a bit over the top with the fight scenes, but there was never a dull moment.

fields.title: Baby Driver
fields.review: This movie is the literal definition of how creative filmmaking can turn a simple and regular story into an exciting thrill ride for the audience.

fields.title: Johnny English Reborn
fields.review: It's a silly and ridiculous movie, that's for sure. I can understand why most people don't and wouldn't like it, but it wasn't necessarily bad.

fields.title: Grown Ups
fields.review: 'Grown Ups' is a pleasant, genial, good-hearted, sometimes icky comedy that's like spending a weekend with well-meaning people you don't want to see again any time real soon.

fields.title: We're the Millers
fields.review: Laughed so hard through it that I can't remember the last film that made me feel this good after spending one and a half hours with it.

fields.title: Spenser Confidential
fields.review: The movie was simple yet enjoyable. It had a good flow and the actors worked well with each other having good on screen chemistry. I would recommend watching.

fields.title: The Hunger Games
fields.review: Loved the movie! But not better than the book of course!

fields.title: Catch Me If You Can
fields.review: Outstanding, and 100% entertaining suspense packed thriller. It is a masterpiece of direction with the unmatchable acting skills of DiCaprio and Tom Hanks.
